overview: One man wants to control all the land in the state to graze all his cattle. His band of outlaws are raiding ranchers and homesteaders, trying to drive them out. Rocky and Fuzzy  are brought in to help stop the raiders and keep the land for the small ranchers and homesteaders.
tagline: Bob's Playin' A Mystery Hand... He's Marked For Death By Killer Bullets As Gunfire Echoes Over The Plains!
title: Raiders of Red Gap
